title: Trump Administration Explores Consolidating Banking Regulators
summary: Trump administration explores consolidating banking regulators by potentially merging FDIC and OCC under Treasury Department, reducing regulatory workforce and oversight. Proposed changes include combining regulatory functions, transferring employees, and potentially eliminating independent banking supervision.
description: Trump administration explores consolidating banking regulators by potentially merging FDIC and OCC under Treasury Department, reducing regulatory oversight and workforce. Potential scenarios include folding FDIC into Treasury, combining FDIC's regulatory role with OCC, or having single leadership over both agencies.
actors: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency
